isis.stitle: 7.3 Liter Diesel Engine Service (1991) - WATER PUMP AND THERMOSTAT - WATER PUMP AND THERMOSTAT - INSTALLATION

note.para: Prior to installation, clean the gasket surfaces on both the water pump and front plate of the engine. Coat both the water pump and front plate gasket surfaces with a thin film of Aviation Permatext No. 3 prior to installing gasket.

step1.para: Place a new gasket on the water pump housing and install water pump as follows:

step2.para: Apply Aviation Permatext No. 3 to the designated bolts. Refer to Figure 7.11. Install the bolts within 5 minutes of the Permatex application.

Install the water pump assembly using 1-1/2 in. long bolts and 2-3/4 in. long bolts as illustrated in Figure 7.11
.

note.para: Refer to installation instructions 1 171 578 R1 included with the water pump service package.

step1.para: Fasten the water pump pulley to the water pump hub using the 4 mounting bolts. Tighten to standard torque.

Install thermostat into the crankcase counterbore, positioned as shown in Figure 7.4
.
Install a new coolant outlet gasket and fasten the coolant outlet elbow to the crankcase using the long and short mounting bolts, with washers. Tighten bolts to specified torque.
Using a new gasket, install the coolant inlet housing. Tighten the two mounting bolts with washers to standard torque.
